## Datenquelle

Global Administrative Boundaries (GADM)

```{r,cache=T}
library("raster")
DEU4 <- getData('GADM', country='DEU', level=4)
```

## Overview data

```{r}
head(DEU4@data)
```


## Subselect

```{r}
SAL <- DEU4[DEU4@data$ID_1==12,]
```

```{r}
plot(SAL)
```
